intro: Мove the animated polygonal pieces to collect charming girls. Solve puzzles, and enjoy high-quality animations!
description:
Welcome to Passion Puzzle - the best puzzle game ever made!
Get ready for an awesome time in Passion Puzzle, where you'll solve puzzles with cute girls! Are you ready to have fun?

Original Gameplay Mechanics
Unlike all other jigsaw puzzle games, Passion Puzzle features original polygonal mechanics: assemble animated hot girls from various polyhedral figures.

High-Resolution Animations to Enjoy
As you progress through the levels, you'll encounter new and more intricate puzzles that will test your skills and keep you engaged. With a variety of detailed animated artworks to discover, leave all your worries behind and immerse yourself in the beautiful world of Passion Puzzle. Enjoy stunning animations of hot girls!

Key Features:
• Vibrant Art: Enjoy stunning visuals featuring a colorful cast of characters.
• PvP Mode (Hotseat): Play with your friends! Work together to complete puzzles and enjoy a fun cooperative experience.
• Engaging Puzzles: Test your puzzle-solving skills with a wide variety of levels.
• Simple Gameplay: Passion Puzzle's intuitive gameplay ensures that even those new to the genre will feel right at home.
• Relaxing Music: Immerse yourself in the soothing soundtrack that perfectly complements the charming atmosphere of Passion Puzzle, helping you unwind and focus on solving the puzzles.

Start Your Awesome Puzzle Adventure Now!
Don't miss out on the most fun and addictive puzzle game! Jump into Passion Puzzle and start your amazing adventure today!
